snippet: The violence, in which the victims had their hands bound and their throats slit, was the latest of a string of attacks with ethnic undercurrents that comes at a time of rising political tensions.
abstract: More than 20 people are killed in two attacks on Kenya's coast; residents say many of the victims had their hands bound and their throats slit, latest in a string of gruesome assaults with ethic undercurrents; it is unclear who the killers are, although Shabab militants from Somalia have taken responsibility.
lead_paragraph: The violence, in which the victims had their hands bound and their throats slit, was the latest of a string of attacks with ethnic undercurrents that comes at a time of rising political tensions.

headline.main: Gruesome Attacks in Kenyan Villages Heighten Fears of a Nation on Edge
headline.print_headline: Gruesome Attacks in Kenyan Villages Heighten Fears of a Nation on Edge
